title: Danil Karpov
text:
Danil Aleksandrovich Karpov (; born 28 June 1999) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20Tyumen">FC Tyumen</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Tyumen">FC Tyumen</a> on 6 May 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Shinnik%20Yaroslavl">FC Shinnik Yaroslavl</a>.
